channel.title: How do you hit a item and it gives xp?
channel.description: Whats the code for hitting a item, such as "Hit the dummy you get 3 lvls on attack" How do you do this?

item.title: How do you hit a item and it gives xp?
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

If you want a strength statue lol

[code=cpp]case 7314:
// Strenghth Statue

		addSkillXP(15000, 1);

break;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you hit a item and it gives xp?

item.title: How do you hit a item and it gives xp?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

its not an item, its an object. open ur client.java and search for the case (obj id) like. lets say… case 409: //prayer
if u wanted prayer to give u an object just add something like

case 409: //prayer addItem(995, 10000); sendMessage("there ya go, have some money"); Break;
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2008, 07:08:38 PM[/size][hr]if u want a harder code, i can give u the one i made, i just didnt feel like searching through my server lol

Read full topic
